class_b_01_math_01:
Hello, everyone. Nice to meet you. My name’s
Tyme, and I will be your math teacher.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_02:
Sorry to put you all on the spot at the start of
class, but let me ask you a quick question—\r
Do you enjoy numbers, arithmetic, and the like?[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_03:
Oh, my. Hahaha. Thank you for your honest
responses.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_04:
Some of you may like numbers, and some may
not. I think that makes a wonderful mix.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_05:
But no matter your opinion on math, I hope you
find yourselves enjoying our lessons together!\c
I’ll do my best to find a good way to match up
your interests with all types of math lessons![VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_06:
Speaking of which, are you all caught up on your
studies of Pokémon type matchups?[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_07:
For example, Grass is strong against Water, and
Water is strong against Fire, correct?[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_08:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)], you seem to
be\r
good\r
with\r
Pokémon,\r
so\r
let\r
me\r
ask\r
you this...[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_09:
Bearing in mind that Water is strong against Fire...
If the move Water Gun hits a Fire-type Pokémon,\r
what becomes of the move’s damage?[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_answer_01:
Oh, my. A little reverse thinking, I see! But I’d
probably be in rough shape afterward if I got hit\r
by something I was weak to. Wouldn’t you be?[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_answer_02:
A real hardy individual, I see! But I’d probably
be in rough shape afterward if I got hit by\r
something I was weak to. Wouldn’t you be?[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_answer_03:
That’s right! I knew I could count on you for this
question, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_10:
Using moves of a type that your opponent is
weak to is a supereffective tactic!\c
It multiplies the damage of those moves by two![VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_11:
On the other hand, using moves of a type that
your opponent is resistant to isn’t very effective.\r
It divides the damage of your moves by two.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_12:
Haha! I don’t mean to encroach on Ms. Dendra’s
battle studies territory, of course, but I thought\r
it best to use a lively topic as an example.[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_13:
That can make math fun even for those of you
who don’t much like the subject, don’t you think?[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_14:
Oh, my. Is that the bell? I suppose that’s all for
now. What a shame...[VAR 0114(0025)]
class_b_01_math_15:
I’m looking forward to seeing you all in the next
class. I hope you’re looking forward to it, too![VAR 0114(0025)]
